title: D2 Player Looking for Team
body:
Hey there, my Name is Maurice, i am 18 years old, from germany and i am currently looking for a team to compete in tournaments, train, aiming for esl one day in best case scenario. I would either play as a top laner in a team, or as a mid laner, since im currently swapping around between those roles in soloQ, for top lane im by far more into fighters, bruisers, damage dealers than tanks and i think most teams dont prefer to have a non tank player on top, so probably mid is the way to go, but u decide :D Ask me out for a Role and i will focus on playing this role of course. You can add me Ingame under my Summoner Name "Cúrse", would be good if u comment under this post when u added me and what your summoner name is, because i got some requests and dont accept all.
Hope to hear from you soon, 

Greetings,
Cúrse
Maurice

replies.body:
Currently working on building a team (players all Plat 1 atm). Target is competitive, yet none of us peaked above D2 so far^^ 

However, we might wanna play some times anyway an figure out the rest ;)

Add: we're lf toplane and jungle atm
why dont u make it a D+ team, Im in, best peek d1 currently d3 adc main (60%winrate)
